::DevilDuer/Zardus::

DevilDuer's head jerks up as the Alliance base's computer's voice declares a 
new finding.

"New energy signals detected," it says, showing two dots on the screen. 
DevilDuer looks at the dots. At last, some action.

"Hey, Perndabot," he says to Perndabot, who has just walked in, "You want to 
go retrieve two new units?"

Perndabot looks up, "Has Zardus authorised this?"

DevilDuer shakes his head. "Not yet," he says and pushes a button on his 
comm-link, "Zardus," he says into it, waiting for his leader to reply.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Inside the conference room, Zardus' comm-link plays back DevilDuer's voice. 
Zardus sets his comm-link to replay the message only in his head, not across 
the room.

"Go ahead," he says into his comm-link.

"The computer has detected two new energy readings, should me and Perndabot 
go check them out?" DevilDuer's voice sounds in his head.

"Yes... Go ahead." Zardus answers into his comm-link and turns to Hell Beast 
and Megatron. "I believe we were about to visit the maximals...."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathStorm turns his chair to Perndabot. "It's authorised."

Perndabot nods and the two bots exit the base, flying off toward Amoebus and 
Bacterium.
